sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng xiān xiě chū lùnwén dàgāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez d'abord rédiger le plan de la thèse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please write the thesis outline first.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 大脑是人体最重要的器官之一。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dànǎo shì réntǐ zuì zhòngyào de qìguān zhīyī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le cerveau est l'un des organes les plus importants du corps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The brain is one of the most important organs in the body.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàxióngmāo shì Zhōngguó de guóbǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le panda géant est le trésor national de la Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The giant panda is China's national treasure.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qíngkuàng dàzhì jiùshì zhèyàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La situation est à peu près comme ça.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The situation is roughly like this.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chénggōng shì yào fùchū dàijià de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le succès a un prix.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Success comes at a price.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shùmù dǎngzhù le shìxiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les arbres bloquent la vue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The trees block the view.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shēngrì dàngāo hěn hǎochī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le gâteau d'anniversaire est délicieux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The birthday cake is delicious.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì dāngdài yìshù zhǎnlǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une exposition d'art contemporain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a contemporary art exhibition.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dāngqián zuì zhòngyào de shì wěndìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Actuellement, la stabilité est la plus importante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Currently, stability is the most important.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de dǎnzi hěn dà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a beaucoup de courage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a lot of courage.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chǎnpǐn zhǒnglèi bù néng tài dānyī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La gamme de produits ne doit pas être trop limitée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The product range should not be too limited.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这篇文章带有讽刺意味。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè piān wénzhāng dàiyǒu fěngcì yìwèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet article a une connotation sarcastique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This article has a sarcastic tone.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā hěn dǎnxiǎo, pà hēi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est timide et a peur du noir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is timid and afraid of the dark.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dìzhèn zàochéng le yánzhòng sǔnshī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le tremblement de terre a causé de graves dommages.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The earthquake caused serious damage.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个考试有不同的等级。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège kǎoshì yǒu bùtóng de děngjí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet examen a différents niveaux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This exam has different levels.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ bǐ dì gěi wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Passe-moi le stylo, s'il te plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pass me the pen.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bìyè diǎnlǐ zài xià zhōu jǔxíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La cérémonie de remise des diplômes aura lieu la semaine prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The graduation ceremony will be held next week.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng fāsòng diànzǐbǎn wénjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez envoyer la version électronique du document.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please send the electronic version of the document.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 外面太冷了，我快冻死了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wàimiàn tài lěng le, wǒ kuài dòng sǐ le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait trop froid dehors, je suis gelé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's too cold outside, I'm freezing.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 政府动员民众参与活动。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèngfǔ dòngyuán mínzhòng cānyù huódòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le gouvernement mobilise les citoyens pour participer à l'activité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The government mobilizes the public to participate in the activity.
